website_summaries.verdict: A rugged set of tools with impressive craftsmanship. The best hex keys on the market today.
pros: A comprehensive set (22 pieces) w/BriteGuard and GoldGuard finish
Sturdy design holds up to tough jobs, and the tips don't "round out" w/heavy use
cons: A bit pricey, but they are built to last, and the quality is guaranteed for life by the manufacturer

customer_reviews.title: 14 Karat Gold finish?
customer_reviews.text: Goldguard finish description: "- Real 14 karat gold finish. - Gold plating will not chip or flake. - Provides better rust corrosion protection than chrome" All well beautifully written, but just take a moment to look at the picture(haven't even opened the product). 1/5 will not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rax

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I use these everyday for my job. I constantly work with allen key screws, bolts, etc. I have used Craftstman, Husky, and Kobalt and these are miles above!! I originally bought due to the fact the carpet I work over caused the black keys to disappear. I was very happy though with the quality of these keys. The tips have not rounded and all the ball ends are in perfect shape after a month of heavy use. I will update if anything changes but so far they are a must have for me.
customer_reviews.author: CasadaPP

customer_reviews.title: Best around
customer_reviews.text: I broke the ball off my two year old set and had to buy a replacement set. I knew it was going to break when I did it, not the tools fault. I came across these I. My search for the best made Allen's around after a cheap no name brand wrench broke and nearly cut my palm open. I use these as a comercial kitchen equipment repair guy and they get wet alllll the time. Only sign of wear is that the metric gold ones have faded to silver... whoopdiedoooo.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy/Ali R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy them asap
customer_reviews.text: These are the best allen keys I have ever owned. The fit is perfect, edges are sharp, and they just feel very strong. They aren't too flashy with the gold/ chrome, its more subtle. The separation of metric/ standard is great so you don't mix them up. They are also made in USA; Bondhus makes sure you know that because it is stamped on the holders and every single wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, these Allen wrenches are beautiful! I never thought I would say those words hah. After going through a few flimsy sets over the years figured I would finally buy a quality set, these seem very strong so far in comparison to the cheapo sets. The coating is great and my hands actually look and feel noticeably clean in comparison to the normal conventional allen wrenches that get crudded after time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Yes they are expensive for allen key wrenches, but they are the best you can get. I love the color difference between metric and standard and find the sizes easy to read. And they are durable. I had the ball end in a bolt and a combination wrench on the short end to give me enough torque to loosen the bolt. the ball end didn't break off like some Chinese ones have in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Timberwolf

customer_reviews.title: Best Hex set I Own!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used various hex keys over the years and this is what I have been waiting for. Half the frustration is finding what size you need and Bondhus organizes everything in a nice holder you can carry anywhere. I love how it has a standard end and ball end for tight areas. Yes you should not break the fastener with the ball end, only use it to thread it out once it is broke loose by the standard end. My only complaint is the set is missing 7mm and 9mm which honestly are odd sizes. Other than that I love this set. Buy it and you will cherish it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McCauley

customer_reviews.title: great keys-- the holder is annoying
customer_reviews.text: These keys are great. Precise fit, and the limiting factor is probably the quality of the steel in the screw- or if the screw is already damaged or not. BUT - for me the case is unevenly fit-- some keys fit loose, others are overly tight. Plus, having to swivel the adjacent keys out of the way is annoying. I prefer the Tekton case
customer_reviews.author: mark Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Good until .......
customer_reviews.text: Would give these a five star but ..... I was able to break one of the balls on my standard set very easily . Hardly and torque on it at all ? Kind of skeptical on buying another set
customer_reviews.author: Carlos b

customer_reviews.title: Sorry bondhus, not this time.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice... But that's about it. The short end of the wrench on about 1/3 of the keys in the pack not fit into a screw head. If I had to guess, I would say they coating is too thick. I'm usually a big fan of bondhus tools. They usually fit properly and last forever. Sorry bondhus, not this time.
customer_reviews.author: Yaki nworb

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the extra coin.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these every day of work for the past 15 years. These are the best Allen wrenches, period! I used the black keys for a year or two, but switched to the gold ones for visibility. Black keys tend to blend in on a lot of flooring surfaces, but the gold keys stand out. The finish stands up to abuse, as well.
customer_reviews.author: aortiz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tools
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. The fit might be on the tighter side but that's totally fine have not run into a situation where it wouldn't fit, but I did need to apply a bit of force to get it in some fasteners. I prefer that however as it reduces the chance of rounding out the tool and fastener.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smajlovic

customer_reviews.title: Bondhus Allen Wrenches in SAE and Metric sizes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tool because I needed metric Allen wrenches working on my bike especially adjusting and removing the seat. I’ve seen the Bondhus name brand and I know I can’t go wrong with the product if I buy it. I can’t trust many of the made in communist China tools.
customer_reviews.author: obetsr51

customer_reviews.title: Easy to locate, rust resistant, Bondhus quality
customer_reviews.text: Been using/abusing these daily for the past 3 months at work. They are what you expect. Bondhus makes a great hex wrench and I expect these will hold up as well or better than my paramounts or weras. If you are considering them, likely your only reservation is with the finish. It does get a little marred with some serious(and i mean serious) use but I think these will stay rust free for many years with zero maintenance or care. Absolutely no buyers remorse with this set, they look great, are very easy to find when you inevitably put one down and immediately forget where you put it, and give you the confidence to really torque on bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pride

customer_reviews.title: Best allens out there!
customer_reviews.text: The only time you ever have to replace these bad boys is when you lose one! They just do not wear out, and they're tough, worst I've been able to inflict was breaking the ball end off of the 1/8" using a 12" wrench to turn it LOL best allen wrenches you can get right here, and for the price too??? Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first set 3 years ago to handle easytostrip 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3mm locktited buttonhead screws and they worked perfectly (at work). Needless to say the bigger wrenches work just as well or better. This second set I bought it for my personal toolbox
customer_reviews.author: Dante Villa

customer_reviews.title: Good fit in bolts and screw; strong and nice finish.
customer_reviews.text: At last - these seem like a good set. Ball ends feel smoother and more secure than others I've used. No torsional twisting under normal operating loads the fit with fasteners has been spot on. Just short of five stars - 4.5 - because the accompanying holder is already losing its grip on the larger keys after a week of mild use. They now tend to slide out of the plastic 'holster' under their own weight if they get the chance.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dermody

customer_reviews.title: Love Boudhus
customer_reviews.text: I love Boudhus hex wrenches, I've used them a lot over the years. These are the best of Boudhus and well worth the price! The big benefit of a good hex wrench over a lesser one; if you've ever stripped out a small allen head or set screw due to a slightly worn or poor fitting hex wrench - you know! It's something you want to avoid at all costs These fit well and hold up very very well.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Great set.. however you might kill yourself removing them from the holder
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set to keep around the house - they look amazing and work very well however ease of access is a bit tight... and by a bit I mean I literally almost knocked my nephew in the face trying to pull a few of them out with a pair of pliers. Do yourself a favor, take them all out then one by one insert them and spin them around a few times to loosen the fitment.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Yup... good tools
customer_reviews.text: I knew what to expect from these... and they delivered. Good tools. As with almost every Allen wrench set... The holder sucks. But... the holder isn't part of the tool, and the tools do their job well. The holder does its job well to be fair. Just a little to well, it doesn't like to stop holding them without a bit of annoyance, and force.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Southard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent excellent
customer_reviews.text: Gives true 25 degree access. They stay in the case and dont fall out. Rock solid metal. Love the color differentiation between metric and imperial so no confusion about which one is which for the little ones that cant be marked.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: the best I can find
customer_reviews.text: This set is dollar for dollar, the best I can find. Had mine for almost five years now. They've weathered a bit, but they've never failed me. Good storage cases keep them from slipping out. If you give them a little bit of respect I feel like this could be a last ever set of wrenches. Also the different finishes help you keep the metric/sae straight. I stick the two cases together with extra heavy duty Velcro in my tool kit.
customer_reviews.author: njoehawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Bondhus
customer_reviews.text: Why buy something cheaper and more cheaply made for a few dollars less and then have it mess up some crucial fastener. Get the best and you'll never regret it. I like the shiny finish because I live in a humid and sometimes salty area and the different colors helps to keep the metric/SAE apart. Holders work well in keeping them organized.
customer_reviews.author: bookwormTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived badly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with the clamshell badly broken and some keys bent. The plastic holders were also scratched and dented badly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: noticeably better
customer_reviews.text: These really are better than the cheap allen wrenches. The quality makes a huge difference in use (surprisingly so). Seems to be a good quality/price ratio - if you use Allen wrenches all the time it might be worth going to one of the really high quality price sets, but I'm only a few days a week
customer_reviews.author: Charles in Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Lasts long and nice features.
customer_reviews.text: Great tools. They haven't rounded out yet, as other cheaper hex wrenches have. Nice to have the two-tones to differentiate metric (gold) and US standard (silver). I am happy with this purchase. The longer end has a nice rounded hex to fit in tighter spots and it is also good for more leverage. My only complaint is that the more you use them the more the case, though it is solid and durable, it tends to round the holes and make the wrenches swivel in place leaving the smaller ones open to bend, although mine have not done so yet. Just a concern. But the case is great: tough and strong and keeps them together well, minus the swiveling.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie C

customer_reviews.title: more than worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been great wrenches. I work in a machine shop, and having a good set of allen wrenches is important. I will probably be buying a few other sets one for home and another for second machine I run so I don't have to move them from machine to machine.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: so shiny
customer_reviews.text: these work just as well as the "regular" bondhus ball drive hex wrenches. they do look way nicer and I experience an internal struggle with grabbing them to use when I knew oil or grease will be involved. hi, I am a mechanic tech and I have ocd. anyways, they do work as expected. I have not yet had opportunity to use my adjustable wrench handle for extra torque applications to see how they resist breakage...but that is only a matter of time. until that, these are great wrenches, tho a bit on the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: greatwhite22

customer_reviews.title: good addition to my tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Being a recently independent man, I have begun to acquire a set of tools as the need arises. I had several projects that involved hex screws and so started looking for a combination set. Seeing a video where the creator used a set of these was enough to sell me on the brand. they have worked well for me thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Biesemier

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Like many of us we like to get the best deal possible but also if possible made in USA. These are superb quality work perfectly and eliminated a bag of random hex keys.
customer_reviews.author: LarRF

customer_reviews.title: Tools for life
customer_reviews.text: I use these at work and at home. These have see daily military use since I got them and you can barely see any marks on them. No bending, rust, or discoloration is a great sign that these will just keep working as intended. I wish they were available with an nsn so I could use shop funds to buy them for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Fendrick

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, but arived with rust.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to sturdy wrenches, what I'd expect from Bondhus. However, I am disappointed that the packaging was damaged and rust had begun forming. Brand new tools, especially above average ones, should never need rust removal right out of th he package.
customer_reviews.author: christie

customer_reviews.title: The best hexers.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are some heavy duty hex wrenches. They fit perfectly into their separate cases and have everything I will ever need and more. I decided since I have to use a hex now and then I might as well get a quality set. This is definitely above and beyond what I need, but I did want some high quality wrenches. The goldguard and chromium finishes look very elegant and pragmantic at the same time. A beautiful set here, machined from what I can see near perfectly. The special balldriver ends are a nice touch. Everything about this set is quality. Top notch tools.
customer_reviews.author: CrankTop Contributor: Rock Music

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bondhus is high quality. I have been using 3 sets of bondhus Allen wrenches 5 days a week for the past four 4 years. I really crank down on bolts and I have broken the heads off maybe 50 bolts and rounded off at least a 1000. Still have not snapped any of my Allen wrenches the bolts always break first.
customer_reviews.author: Lazarus

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a lot of Allen wrench sets over the years and this set beats them all. I work industrial maintenance in a damp environment and rounding off wrenches on rusty set screws ruins your wrenches and busts your knuckles. These are not showing any signs of that and are coated to keep them from rusting themselves. The different colors for standard and metric really helps also. They are my go-to wrenches.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Best tools I use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite tools I use on a daily basis. I work in an engineering shop and some of the jobs I work on there is just no way traditional hex keys will get the job done. Having the 30 degree ball point ends are absolute life savers. I highly recommend trying these out, I'm pretty sure you're going to love them!
customer_reviews.author: VCCV

customer_reviews.title: top quality ball end wrenches
customer_reviews.text: I got the fancy gold/silver ones mostly to differentiate them from the rest of the wrenches in the shop. Every other pack inevitably ends up loose in a bin, but I have managed to keep this kit together for months now in a shared lab space just because it looks like it should stay together. (and everyone knows there are MINE) The wrenches them selves are excellent, showing minimal surface wear and no rounding.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Payton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty hot
customer_reviews.text: I love these wrenches. Bondhus makes some great wrenches to begin with, but the plating on these ones makes them actually look good. I know it's silly, but I like my tools to look good and perform good.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: Tough finish to keep in tool bag in jeep.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Like the finish as these are for my jeep. Did not want anodized type as they will rust if not kept indoors. Used the other day fit nicely. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Calloni

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking set, but I managed to bend one while working on the car, and it snapped when I tried to straighten it back out in the vice. Sadly, these aren't sold individually, so I'm now just missing a 5mm wrench. Bah.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wrenches
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice wrench set and great warranty. I mostly use the 3mm and have to put a bit of torque on it and after a lot of use it snapped. Emailed bondhus and they sent a replacement right away no questions asked. I keep a spare set of regular bondhus keys so I was good while I waited.
customer_reviews.author: zc

customer_reviews.title: High quality tool set.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a very high quality Allen wrench set. These are very long and worked great to disassemble and clean my paint spray gun.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Eh why not
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why I paid more for the shiny ones, the black ones are great. I figure this will be the last set of Allen's I ever need to buy so why not get the shiny easy to clean set.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hex set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hex set. They are noticeably harder than any other set I have used and the geometry of the ball end is perfect. I definitely appreciate the color difference between the sets. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: i found the size of ball end and non-ball end ...
customer_reviews.text: i found the size of ball end and non-ball end is slightly different, the non-ball end is slightly larger, which makes trouble for me when i am using it, i am not sure is it a common condition or just me get the unqualified one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality. I really wrench on them, they don't round off easily or twist even when I am using a wrench to cheat. I use them daily in an industrial environment and they have lasted. I have only had to replace ones I've lost. The finish doesn't scratch off or mar. It is very helpful to easily see which one you want to pull out of your tool bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why buy anything else! Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: Best Allen wrenches made for your money hardened steel that doesn’t round off the corners like cheap set will.
customer_reviews.author: Jackal

customer_reviews.title: Best wrenches I have owned
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best hex wrenches I have owned. I work in factory maintenance so I use these on a daily basis. The first thing I noticed about these is that they fit the bolts far better than any other brand I have owned. Also these are tougher than any brand I have used including Allen®. They don't bend, twist, or snap. Overall great tools.
customer_reviews.author: Nebenbay

customer_reviews.title: Quality steel. Machined well.
customer_reviews.text: These are quality tools. Hard, durable steel, made very well. These will last until you lose them!!
customer_reviews.author: greg tate

customer_reviews.title: Durable, quality, look good!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product every work day for 1.5 years. I took care of them, but definitely pushed them to the limit. None of them broke on me. I even dropped the 3/16” one in a resin grinder and it only left a small scratch and tripped the OL’s for the motor. I would recommend these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Dewald

customer_reviews.title: Great set of hexes
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking forward to these wrenches for a while. My coworker has had the same set for 10 years while I have blasted through at least 5 craftsman sets. The longest wrenches in this particular set reaches 7" and they have a great heft to them. The finish is unique and will help me figure out who is stealing my wrenches!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: These fit nice and tight
customer_reviews.text: These fit nice and tight, Almost to a fault. When inserting the wrench into a socket head screw, it takes a second to get it in the right position. This especially true for worn fasteners. The bright finish is a plus. I often set my wrenches on black or dark surfaces. These stand out nicely. The different colors for metric and sae save me time, as I have sae and metric out at the same time. The finish is holding up nicely after a couple of weeks of daily use in an industrial setting..
customer_reviews.author: GPx2

customer_reviews.title: Very slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: Strong with a very accurate size. Very slip resistant, hardened.
customer_reviews.author: Master Technician

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: nothing else needs to be said. bondhus hex keys are the best.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: top quality
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for, top quality, never have had issues with this brand of hex wrenches (have about 3 pairs of these now).
customer_reviews.author: Bruce R Stevens

customer_reviews.title: My main dislike is at the finish on both sets of Allen ...
customer_reviews.text: My main dislike is at the finish on both sets of Allen wrenches is very dull and it's hard to differentiate between the two. I bought these Allen wrenches so I could tell the difference between standard and Metric not that I couldn't look at the Allen wrenches and figure that out but I just wanted something I could just look at it a glance. I will update if I get another set and see if the Finish is better.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will never work with standard quality ball end wrenches again ...
customer_reviews.text: Will never work with standard quality ball end wrenches again. It’s been more than three years of daily use servicing and repairing CNC machines. I have not once had to dress the end nor have I snapped a ball end off. One of the most durable tools I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Happy Kombucha Boy that can’t spell

customer_reviews.title: ... with high end power mobility devices and the manufacturers love to cut weight any way they can
customer_reviews.text: I work with high end power mobility devices and the manufacturers love to cut weight any way they can. Unfortunately, that means lightweight alloys instead of hardened steel machine bolts. I've used cheap allen wrenches in the past and have turned a 10 minute job into an hour long headache. These Bondhus allens are the real deal. I've had the standard set for over three years with daily use. I lost my 3/16 and tried to get by with a lesser quality replacement. Big mistake. I purchased these and couldn't be happier with my new set. I rubbed them in my buddy's nose and he had to order a set himself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than black.
customer_reviews.text: I have had several makes of "Allen" wrenches in the past and these have to be the best by far. I would have to say that the Bondhus brand is a great USA made tool. Surprisingly these are even better because of the colors. I didn't think the colors were going to be a big deal to me but after almost a year of use it is one of the best features. I can tell at a quick glance if I'm grabbing ASE or Metric and no other guys in the shop have silver and gold wrenches. Bondhus knocked it well out of the park with these.
customer_reviews.author: K in the Country

customer_reviews.title: best end wrench set worth the cost!!!
customer_reviews.text: These wrenches are very strong and have good grip and feel in fastener. I use both metric and standard daily as industrial mechanic for over 3 years.. none have broken or rounded. The black finish Bondhus wrench set is just as good strength wise but doesn't have the same feel to the finish. They also tend to rust when exposed while the finish on this set doesn't. I like them so much I am buying a set for my home toolbox as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very high end product with excellent feel in your hand
customer_reviews.text: These wrenches have a very good feel. When inserted into button head cap screws, they have a sharp edge which bites down nicely. If you've ever ground a fresh edge on an Allen wrench after the tip was worn, you may know the feel of a sharp edge. This has the same feel, but without the need to grind it. The coating is impressive. They hold up to steam sterilization, ethanol spray, and chlorine dioxide spray. The ball ends seem very durable thus far, after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: IGoogledU

customer_reviews.title: Best Allen Wrench Set Ever...
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best Allen Wrench Set that I have ever owned. It includes both metric and English wrench sizes. Each wrench has one standard side and one ball end size so that you can use them for any job. They come in really nice cases for easy stowing away and getting to when you need them. They are very sturdy to last a lifetime. Lastly they are made in the USA. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Rugged
customer_reviews.text: I use these every day for work. Much better that other brands and styles I have used in the past. Perfect tight fit and don't round off after extensive use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bowyer

customer_reviews.title: Best quality allen wrenches I have ever purchased.....
customer_reviews.text: They are very well made, fit well and do bend or round out hardware. Very high quality, always buy USA MADE tools!
customer_reviews.author: Adam A Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have used these everyday for 6 months and they work amazing
customer_reviews.author: Dylan fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great USA made hex key wrenches
customer_reviews.text: The case on these is honestly probably my favorite part. The hex keys are great, sizes are accurate, but I love that the wrenches move freely enough in the case to get the one I need out easily. I've had other brands of hex keys and I always felt like I had to fight to get the one size I need out. I do wish the metric set had more sizes in it, but I can live with that. Bondhus also makes a really good set of the T handle ones too that are worth checking out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: They are really well made and very handsome in their container. I've had no problems with them flexing or rounding over.
customer_reviews.author: nibbles

customer_reviews.title: Hands down Best Allen Wrenches on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I work as an Industrial maintenance Technician, and as you could probably imagine, there's so tight stuff around a Factory. Everybody on the Maintenance staff would recommend Bondhus to Everybody, because none of them have EVER seen a twisted Wrench or T-handle with BONDHUS written on it. Travis actually Scratched out the Snap-On emblem on his Wrenches and Engraved 'Bondhus' into then for added integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Allen key sets  work just right
customer_reviews.text: Allen key set : Just what I wanted works very well
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Hex Wrench Set
customer_reviews.text: The coating is durable and does not flake or come off. I have used the same set for 5years in a heavy industrialized setting. Bondhus products are the best the USA has to offer and the durability is unmatched. This set doesn't seem to slip or score like the standard sets, and having these in an environment where everything is dark and dirty, makes the bright-anealed and cadmium-coated tool easy to find should you drop one.
customer_reviews.author: JNgineer

customer_reviews.title: Great allen wrenches hard to strip out
customer_reviews.text: I use them every day as a millwright best allen wrenches they dont strip out like the craftsman
customer_reviews.author: Devan Hurley

customer_reviews.title: BONDHUS IS QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased Bondhus allen wrench set. I've only used two small wrenches but I am happy with them. I recommend these wrenches to all who need them. USA made sealed the deal. They just look right and sure work right. I recommend them and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzard II

customer_reviews.title: I've had this set for over 3 years, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for over 3 years, and use them probably on a weekly basis around our property. They have held up extremely well and are worth every penny. At first I wasn't too keen on the dual-colors, but it really makes it obvious which are metric and which are standard... If I ever need to buy more I will stick with the Bondhus brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as used to be
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many sets of this brand but these particular sets are not as durable as what I have bought in the past. Must be the B quality of the brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Use them daily for setups will buy again if I ever need to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Glasscoe

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Bondhus allen wrenches are the best I've used. Nice case and finish. Shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: bruceian

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones to buy
customer_reviews.text: These are the ones to buy a really good quality the different colors makes it easy to return them to their correct designation SAE or metric
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: great set!
customer_reviews.text: bought this set on amazon because i got tired of not having the right wrench for the job. this set is very complete. since i've been using it i haven't come across a situation where i didn't have the right wrench size (as i often did with a less complete set). the color coding for metric and american standard is brilliant. easy to find the right wrench, and store it after use. price is great! MADE IN USA!
customer_reviews.author: slackerchef

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I used to have tons of issues with my hex keys knurling on the bottoms and then stripping set screws as a result, especially the little ones. But I've had this set for well over 6 months and put it through some brutal daily use repairing moving lights and other production electronics and they have been fantastic. Stripped set screws means hours of unnecessary labor for me and enough was enough. I will never by any other brand of hex keys. Truly amazing product. And the color coding is pretty sexy too. I mean.... real gold? That's some baller a** s**t.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Knister

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient !
customer_reviews.text: Much heftier than I thought they'd be and the plastic organizer they come in is marked with sizes as well as one the wrenches themselves, the wrenches lock into place with a twist plus you have all the sizes at your fingertips so I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: SeanCeltiad

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The wrenches feel very snug when using and the smaller ones are able to withstand quite a bit of torque. I ordered this set because I broke off a few smaller ones off another set that I own (different brand). These wrenches barely even bend where my old ones would twist until snapping.
customer_reviews.author: Netty

customer_reviews.title: Made in america
customer_reviews.text: This set has worked good for me and showed up in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gonalez

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this brand for years. I use them daily in my work. They do not wear are easy.
customer_reviews.author: dane love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good price for something I know will last me, as long as I don’t lose them
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: The best there is.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best hex wrenches I have ever used. With GoldGuard for metric and BriteGuard for SAE makes it easy to identify the correct wrench. The ball end is very useful in tight fitting places. I wouldn't use anything else than the Bondhus wrenches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been using these awhile now, and I have really ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using these awhile now, and I have really put a lot of torque on the very small ones ( kind of made me feel wussy I couldn't break them ). Anyways, so I took the 3/8 inch one and whacked it against the narrow edge of an older craftsman wrench, that was made in USA. It put a dent into the wrench. I may try it on a proto or snap on soon.
customer_reviews.author: marc holcombe

customer_reviews.title: Tough coating, High quality
customer_reviews.text: Coating is TOUGH and makes identification super fast! I use these professionally for my job where they cannot rust. All the other guys quickly bought a set for themselves once they saw mine. I have abused these with channel locks and they have not distorted, these are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Engimanerd

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best.
customer_reviews.text: Best Allen wrenches out there, bar none. Still have my grandfather's set. The ball end works perfect. The new platings prevent rust, and I can tell at a glance which is which.
customer_reviews.author: Del Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good Allen wrenches
customer_reviews.text: Only used them a few times so far, but so far they're perfect. Whenever I've need a particular size, it has been there. Even the design of the cases is good in that the individual wrenches don't fall out and the color coding between metric and SAE keeps you from grabbing the wrong set. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pnc

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Have a set at work and absolutely love them bought another set for home. They really hold up to daily abuse. The different colors for metric and standard are fantastic feature you will never misplace the Allen in the wrong set again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I only trust Bindhus when for this type of tool.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, the ball in the end is must have.
customer_reviews.author: David Fortlage

customer_reviews.title: Best Allen Wrench Set I Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with these. I have bought about 10 sets for my machine shop and they are all still in service. We've tried other brands with lifetime warrantees. That is great, but I don't like having to use the warrantee and stop to go swap wrenches. These, I have never seen a twisted or rounded off edge. I recommend them, even in an industrial setting.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems to have gone off.
customer_reviews.text: I have these same tools that I bought over 5 years ago. I think they have gone down hill. They are certainly going to function, it's just the finish seems off. The balls are not very nice looking. It could even have a negative effect on the allen bolt hex if you put much torque using the ball end. It's not worth the trouble to send them back, but I would get more expensive allen wrenches if I were doing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Merz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best wrenches, hands down. Great grip. Ball ends work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wiltse

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality for the price. The different colored finishes makes distinguishing between standard and metric a breeze. The ball-end allows these to be used securely at an angle. Finally, the product is made in the USA. I can't think of a better set of hex wrenches for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J.I.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good variety of sizes. Good build quality. So far they have been doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew D. Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: Solid tool value
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of "normal" length allen wrenches, but the extra length on these, has already come in handy after only having them a week! The high initial quality and fair price add up to a solid value!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristofer LaKey

customer_reviews.title: Best set of hex wrenches
customer_reviews.text: This set is the best set I've ever owned. I use my hand tools dailey in my line of work and it is important that they be reliable. These fit the bill. Using for more than 60 days and they look new, Every size fits nice and tight. I also like the different colors. Makes clean up go faster when you working some of the mixed SAE Metric repairs.
customer_reviews.author: flcoconut

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best Allen set on the market
customer_reviews.text: Would give it six stars if possible. I’m a maintenance mechanic for Kellogg and these wrenches never fail to do the job. They’re extremely durable and the price is cheap for such great quality. Nearly every mechanic in the shop uses Bondus Allen wrenches I have yet to see one twist or snap. Also they’re made in USA so do yourself and American workers a favor and purchase this set!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shearer

customer_reviews.title: decent set of tools
customer_reviews.text: no rounding like cheap quality sets(which I wasted time and money for too long). a"good"product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mark swanson

product_meta.title: Bondhus 20399 Ball End L-Wrench DoublePK w/BriteGuard & GoldGuard Finish
product_meta.description:
Size:One SizeThe purpose of a high quality tool is to provide a faster, easier, and less costly means of performing a task. Bondhus strives to provide not just “good” tools, but the strongest tools available anywhere. Customer satisfaction is what we strive for.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This unique double pack offers a metric ball end L-Wrench set with GoldGuard finish and an inch ball end L-Wrench set with BriteGuard finish to easily distinguish the difference between inch and metric tools at a glance. Compact Balldriver L-Wrench sets are perfect where a variety of tool sizes are required. All sets are packaged in our patented Bondhex tool case. Wrenches slip easily into individually marked slots and twist to lock securely in place. Only available from Bondhus, Protanium steel means these are the strongest ballpoint L-Wrenches available.
feature_bullets: Forged from special Protanium steel for extra-high torque, these L Wrenches feature handy Ball driver ends
Coated in exclusive BriteGuard (inch) and Gold Guard (metric) finish
Packaged in the patented Bond hex tool case that doubles as extension/ leverage handle
The original Balldriver L-Wrenches save time in hard to reach and blind locations, Made in USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars892 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
